pr_title: Properly check whether thumbnail generation is timeout or not.

timeline.message: Properly check whether thumbnail generation is timeout or not.

timeline.bodyText: This could probably be used directly in the if, rather being set to a boolean isFinished since it never gets referred to again after that.
timeline.author: SammyIsConfused

replies.author: edalex-ian

timeline.bodyText:
Why would it be empty? Is it simply a normal situation, in that there were no child PIDs? Or it is always due to an error situation from going into the else block on line 89?
I'm just wondering if this needs a companion else block to either log the situation, or to throw an exception. 🤔 Or if it's just normal - i.e. there may be no child PIDs sometimes - then this is just a guard against this processing. Maybe a comment in this case would highlight the assumption. 🤔
timeline.author: edalex-ian

replies.bodyText: There may be no child PIDs sometimes - in fact most cases. PDF extraction causes ImageMagick to open Ghostscript which is the child PID - but for cases in which ImageMagick can handle things fine on its own, such as most images, there will be no delegate process opened.
replies.author: SammyIsConfused

replies.bodyText: I feel we need to throw an runtime exception in the else block on line 89 if getChildPid fails for some unknown reasons.
replies.author: PenghaiZhang

replies.bodyText: Ah perhaps it's better to do a LOGGER.warn rather than throwing an exception.
replies.author: PenghaiZhang
